title: Iso8601_duration
description:
Represents an ISO 8601 duration, which may have multiple parts from years down to seconds. Value is in format:

* `P[nnY][nnM][nnW][nnD][T[nnH][nnM][nnS]]`
$comments: Defined in Foundation_types IM, inherits from Iso8601_type

value.description: Representation of all descendants is a single String.
